benchmark_details.name: BIPIA
benchmark_details.overview: The first benchmark for indirect prompt injection attacks to assess the risk of such vulnerabilities in LLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the vulnerabilities of LLMs to indirect prompt injection attacks and develop effective defenses.
tasks: Evaluate LLMs against indirect prompt injection attacks
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Focus on indirect prompt injection attacks; does not cover direct attacks.

data.annotation: Malicious instructions embedded in external content

methodology.calculation: ASR computed based on the ratio of successful attacks to total attacks.
methodology.interpretation: Lower ASR indicates better defense against prompt injection attacks.
methodology.validation: Tested defenses against original model performance and evaluated through multiple task prompts.

targeted_risks.harm: Potential for malicious outputs based on exploited vulnerabilities in LLMs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Manually reviewed to exclude harmful attacks on personal property and health.
